trans-unit.source: Provides a protection level and an exchange mechanism as part of the context of a binding element and the functionality to build the channel listeners and factories.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> allows the user to add an element to the binding of a service for managing its context exchange protocol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> permite al usuario agregar un elemento al enlace de un servicio para administrar su protocolo de intercambio de contexto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> is typically stacked on top of reliability, security, and transport binding elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement>, normalmente, se apila encima de los elementos de enlace de confianza, seguridad y transporte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> does not require any configuration options and can create channel factories for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> no requiere ninguna opción de configuración, y puede crear los generadores de canales para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel>y <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It can also create channel listeners for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Además, puede crear agentes de escucha del canal para las interfaces <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>.

trans-unit.source: A context channel does not change the channel interface – the underlying channel stack must support the requested channel shape and session capability.
trans-unit.target: Un canal de contexto no cambia la interfaz del canal; la pila del canal subyacente debe admitir la forma de canal y la función de sesión solicitadas.

trans-unit.source: The channel listeners and factories are used to construct the part of the channel stacks used to process incoming and outgoing messages.
trans-unit.target: Los agentes de escucha y los generadores del canal se utilizan para construir la parte de las pilas del canal usadas en el procesamiento de mensajes entrantes y salientes.

trans-unit.source: If a session-based binding is created with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> and used with a contract that specifies <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.NotAllowed>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when the channel is created with the following text: "Channel context management cannot be enabled or disabled after the channel is opened."
trans-unit.target: Si se crea un enlace basado en sesión con un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> y se usa con un contrato que especifica <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.NotAllowed>, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> se produce cuando se crea el canal con el siguiente texto: "administración del contexto del canal no puede habilitarse o deshabilitarse una vez que se abre el canal."

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Allowed> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Required> or not use a session-based channel.
trans-unit.target: Debe establecer <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A> en <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Allowed> o <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Required>, o no utilizar un canal basado en sesión.

trans-unit.source: When creating a custom binding, it is recommended that you add the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> of the custom binding before adding any reliability and security binding elements, if present.
trans-unit.target: Al crear un enlace personalizado, se recomienda que agregue el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> a la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> del enlace personalizado antes de agregar cualquier elemento de enlace de confianza y seguridad, en caso de existir alguno.

trans-unit.source: If you do not, your service may throw a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException> with the following message:
trans-unit.target: De no hacerlo, su servicio puede iniciar una <xref:System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException> con el mensaje siguiente:

trans-unit.source: "Context channel received a message with context which does not match the current context cached at the channel.
trans-unit.target: “El canal de contexto recibió un mensaje con contexto que no coincide con el contexto actual almacenado en la caché del canal.

trans-unit.source: Ensure service does not change context after it was originally set or disable context management by setting channel property 'IContextManager.Enabled' to false."
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que el servicio no cambia el contexto establecido originalmente, o deshabilita la administración del contexto estableciendo la propiedad de canal 'IContextManager.Enabled' en false”.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> class.

Sets the default values of <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.Sign> for <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism.ContextSoapHeader> for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism>.
trans-unit.target: Establece los valores predeterminados de <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.Sign> para <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, y <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism.ContextSoapHeader> para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> for the binding element.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> class with a specified level of protection.
Sets the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism.ContextSoapHeader> for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism>.
trans-unit.target: Establece el valor predeterminado de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism.ContextSoapHeader> para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism>.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="protectionLevel" /> is not valid.
The <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> for the binding element.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism" /> that specifies the mechanism used to exchange context for the binding element.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> class with a specified level of protection and exchange mechanism.
<paramref name="protectionLevel" /> or <paramref name="contextExchangeMechanism" /> is not valid.
The protection level form the binding element.
The mechanism used to exchange context for the binding element.
The client callback address.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> class with the specified protection level, context exchange mechanism, and client callback address.
The protection level for the binding element.
The mechanism used to exchange context for the binding element.
The client callback address.
<see langword="true" /> if the context management is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> class with the specified protection level, context exchange mechanism, client callback address, and a value that specifies whether context management is enabled.
The type of channel the channel factory produces.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de canal que produce el generador de canales.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the channel.
Builds the channel factory stack on the client that creates a specified type of channel for a specified context.
An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /> of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> for the specified context.
<paramref name="context" /> set is <see langword="null" />.
The type of channel the channel listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de canal que acepta el agente de escucha del canal.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the listener.
Builds the channel listener stack on the client that accepts a specified type of channel for a specified context.
An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" /> of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> for the specified context.
<paramref name="context" /> set is <see langword="null" />.
The type of channel the channel factory produces.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de canal que produce el generador de canales.

trans-unit.source: Only <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel" />, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel" />, and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel" /> are allowed by default.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, sólo se permiten <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel" />, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel" />, y <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the factory.
Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding element can build a factory for a specified type of channel and context.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified channel factory stack can be built on the client; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The type of channel the channel listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de canal que acepta el agente de escucha del canal.

trans-unit.source: Only <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel" />, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel" />, and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel" /> are allowed by default.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, sólo se permiten <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel" />, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel" />, y <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the listener.
Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a listener for a specified type of channel and context.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified channel listener stack can be built on the service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets the client callback address for the binding element.
The client callback address.
trans-unit.target: La dirección de devolución de llamada del cliente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> object initialized from the current one.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement" /> object initialized from the current one.

The cloned <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> object has the same <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement.ProtectionLevel%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism> values of the current <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> object.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> clonado posee los mismos valores <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement.ProtectionLevel%2A> y <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism> que el objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> actual.

trans-unit.source: This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone.
trans-unit.target: Esto crea una copia completa del árbol de objetos del elemento de enlace actual, también denominado clon en profundidad.

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: Un clon profundo de un objeto crea una copia del objeto y una copia de todo aquello a lo que el objeto hace referencia directa o indirectamente.

trans-unit.source: This is called copying the entire object graph.
trans-unit.target: Esto se denomina copia del gráfico de objetos completo.

trans-unit.source: Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: Devolver un clon profundo permite admitir en tiempo de ejecución el caso en el que varios enlaces personalizados comparten un elemento de enlace personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Si no se devuelve un clon en profundidad, el comportamiento en tiempo de ejecución no está definido.

trans-unit.source: A shallow clone of an object is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: Un clon superficial de un objeto es sólo una copia del mismo.

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: Si el objeto contiene referencias a otros objetos, la copia superficial no crea copias de los objetos a los que se hace referencia, sino que solo copia las referencias a los objetos originales.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exchange mechanism used to communicate context for the binding element.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism" /> that specifies the mechanism used to exchange context for the binding element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism" /> que especifica el mecanismo utilizado por el elemento de enlace para intercambiar contexto.

trans-unit.source: The value set is not valid.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether context management is enabled.
<see langword="true" /> if context management is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si está habilitada la administración de contexto; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter" /> that exports the metadata information.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> object that provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
Writes custom policy assertions into the context of the binding element.
<paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" /> or the policy assertion in the binding is <see langword="null" />.
The typed object for which the method is querying.
trans-unit.target: El objeto con tipo que está consultando el método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> specified.
Returns the typed object with the specified context from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.
The typed object <paramref name="T" /> requested if it is present.
<paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the level of protection for the binding element from the context.
The <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> for the binding element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> del elemento de enlace.

trans-unit.source: The value set is not valid.
